title: Brazil: Citi Offers Line of Credit of up to R$ 750,000 for Doctors
summary: São Paulo - A partnership between Citi Brazil and the Brazilian Medical Association (AMB) brings with it a series of exclusive benefits for physicians. The promotion is valid for medical professionals who open a Citi account between May 2 and December 31, 2012. Doctors do not have to be affiliated with the AMB to be eligible for the Citibank benefits; the only requirement is to apply for a checking account at a Citi branch and activate it within two months of its approval (see terms and conditions).
tag-1: Brazil: Citi Offers Line of Credit of up to R$ 750,000 for Doctors
tag-2: São Paulo – A partnership between Citi Brazil and the Brazilian Medical Association (AMB) brings with it a series of exclusive benefits for physicians. The promotion is valid for medical professionals who open a Citi account between May 2 and December 31, 2012. Doctors do not have to be affiliated with the AMB to be eligible for the Citibank benefits; the only requirement is to apply for a checking account at a Citi branch and activate it within two months of its approval (see terms and conditions).
tag-3: Among the services offered, clients will have access to personalized attention and investment consulting. In addition, the bank is offering a line of credit of up to R$ 750,000 exclusively for these account holders. The funds may be used, for example, to remodel physicians' offices or purchase medical equipment. Physicians who sign up for a rate package will be exempt from interest payments for the first six months after the account is approved. If they sign up for automatic debits to their checking account during the first three months, this exemption will be extended for an additional six months as long as the account remains active during this entire period. They will also be eligible to save up to R$ 400 of the 2012 annual AMB membership fee (see terms and conditions).
tag-4: Account and loan approval are subject to a credit and salary analysis by Citi. To learn more about the terms and conditions of the Citi-AMB partnership, please consult the nearest Citibank branch or contact 4004-2484 (São Paulo and Rio de Janeiro); 0800-701-2484 elsewhere in Brazil.
tag-5: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
